title: Land use and abuse
creator_credit: John M. Bale, Damien Parer and Tasmanian Film Corporation
brief_description: Shows the impact of careless land development on the Tasmanian environment and goes on to stress the need for conservationists and developers to work together. Narrated by Stewart Faichney.
creator_credit_for_label: John M. Bale, Damien Parer and Tasmanian Film Corporation
